tags: None
review:
I highly recommend Dr. Sushil Sharma to anyone who is considering joint replacement surgery. My aunt visited him for a knee replacement surgery one year ago, and she has been doing great ever since. The surgery was a success, and she has been able to return to her normal activities without any pain. My uncle also recently visited Dr. Sharma for a rotator cuff repair. The surgery was also a success, and he is already feeling much better. He was able to return to work after just a few weeks.
I was very impressed with Dr. Sharma's knowledge, skill, and bedside manner. He took the time to explain my aunt and uncle's conditions in detail and answer all of our questions. He also made sure that they were comfortable and informed throughout the entire process.
The facilities at the clinic were clean and modern. The staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend Dr. Sharma to anyone who is considering joint replacement surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Great  experience of getting my knee  fracture  treatment  from Dr Sushi Sharma .He is a money wise  reasonable doc &  is quite experienced and could locate a tiny fracture , that my earlier  ortho doctor  had missed. I was suffering from lot of pain because &  had lot of apprehension about it before coming to him    but Dr Sushil Sharma assured  me  politively that I will  be well soon, and has given me a walking plaster so that I can attend office .

The staff and services  at his clinic  are very good .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My father recently came to Noida just to get operated on ligament tear that he had couple of years ago in his ankle. He was almost operated in Bangalore 6 months ago but due to other family issues finally it could not have been materialized.He still regrets for that miss. I researched for the best orthopedists in Noida mostly over the net, and found that Dr Sharma is very qualified for the job. We were very happy anticipating good health for my father. So, I reached hospital early morning today to get an appointment between 1PM-2PM. Luckily I got the first appointment of the day,  my wife and my father visited the doctor during that given slot. When I called them later the day I came to know that the consultation took place but both of them are really disappointed and it was one of their bad experiences. All their hopes fallen flat and they returned home with an appointment with another orthopedist...
We are not losing hope in humanity, *** ****** *** ** **** ******* *** **** ** ***** we will try again with some other orthopedist in some where else. Thanks.

tags: None
review: For joint pain (wrist and shoulder) Consulted 3 times in a month with lots of tests and huge medicines. After 10 days, he recommended Physiotherapy for 10 days.. *** ** *********** ******* *** ** **** ******* * *** **** ** ***** ****** *** ** ********** Not satisfactory.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am quite  impressed with Dr Sharma and he also looks very experienced .
.I went to him for the first time for my mother's chronic back ache .What I liked most was the detailed examination despite being busy and also he did not ask for any extra investigations specially the X-ray and MRI ,as I already had them. In fact he told me to get all the investigations ...so that there would be no repetition. He talked to her very politely and also gave her a lot of confidence that she would be ok .He is very well behaved the staff is also helpful .

I am very hopeful that now everything good will happen to my mother

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
1. I did not see any doctor better than Dr. Sushil Sharma in my life. My brother had a very dangerous accident 10 years ago, in which his elbow bone of his right arm was badly broken and came out of the meat. We thought that in his right hand it is now no longer the same as before. But Dr. Sushil Sharma has some magic wand, he has done his operation by doing my brother's hand properly. Today he runs a bike with the same hand, he also typing, and even more weight is also very comfortable. Defense takes.
2.  Five years ago, my father-in-law was very troubled by the pain of the knee. Sushil Sharma advised us to knee Replacement, Dad was very scared but he explained it with so much love and trust that he recognized, and not only did he assist us in the operating expenses. Today, my father is free from the pain of his feet due to Dr. Sushil and the ladder also climbs and runs. Whenever I find out the complaint of any bone, I always recommend the name of Dr. Sushil Sharma.** **** **** ***** ** ** ***** **** ****** **** *** ****** ****** ** ***** *** ** *** ***** ******

tags: None
review: Unfiair practices by clinic staff. Very unsatisfactory. No value for time of patients.The doctor did not come on time. In fact, he did not come at all. However, we asked to provide recommendation of their service before any treatment. This is completely unfair. I cannot vouch for the doctor but I can surely say the staff need a complete ovrhaul.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted the doctor for total hip replacement surgery of my cousin who was diagnosed with avascular necrosis. Post the hip replacement at a very reasonable price he has recovered and is able to manage all activities without much hassles. The treatment at all stages was seamless. 

Would recommend the surgeon for any similar replacements.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very satisfying experience. I had crushed my foot under a four-wheeler. I went to him in his clinic. The staff was helpful and Dr Sharma also is very experienced. He immediately assessed my injury, gave me first aid and then operated and put  some wires and fixed the fracture . I am now recovering well. Money wise also I found him fair and reasonable .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Very good experience getting treated and operated  by  Dr Sushil Sharma last month as I had a ligament  injury  in the shoulder. The doctor   examined me very well  and suggested  MRI in which  his diagnosis was right. 
He did  arthroscopy of the shoulder at a reasonable cost . I have recovered well  and am back to my sport  .
